attributes.action: Pharmaceutical drug shortages in the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
We call on the Department of Health to take urgent action to ensure that adequate supplies of prescription drugs are available to NHS patients. We are concerned that pharmacists are having to spend too much time searching for supplies. Drugs should be available within 24 hours of being prescribed.
http://www.pharmatimes.com/article/13-12-03/UK_drug_shortages_harming_patients_in_75_of_cases.aspx

rejection.details: Please see petition - Department of Health should take immediate action to resolve medicine shortages!
